## Importing all user info data

```{r}
user_info_files <- dir_ls(
  here("data-raw/mmash/"),
  regexp = "user_info.csv",
  recurse = TRUE
)
user_info_df <- map(
  user_info_files,
  import_user_info # Without () for the function to be an object
) %>%
  list_rbind(names_to = "file_path_id") # bind by rows and adding the file path (the name of each dataframe in the list from map)
user_info_df
```
